title: Will Aaron Hernandez’s Family Receive $15 Million from the NFL?
subtitle: Aaron Hernandez's conviction could be vacated under the obscure legal doctrine of abatement ab initio, but that won't necessarily entitle his family to millions of dollars.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Due to an obscure Massachusetts legal doctrine, Aaron Hernandez's death vacates his conviction and entitles his family to $15 million under the terms of his severed NFL contract.
